info.name: lbm_2d_fluid
info.description:
Use mouse to draw the wall. (用鼠标绘制墙)
Use E to cycle brush between pen and eraser. (E键切换笔和橡皮）
Use V to show the velocity. (V键显示速度场)
Use F to show the free surface. (F键显示表面张力)

LBM: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lattice_Boltzmann_methods

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
//from @ndel https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4dK3zG
#define f0(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2, 0).r)
#define f1(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2, 0).g)
#define f2(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2, 0).b)
#define f3(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,0),0).r)
#define f4(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,0),0).g)
#define f5(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,0),0).b)
#define f6(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(0,1),0).r)
#define f7(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(0,1),0).g)
#define f8(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(0,1),0).b)
#define RHO(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,1),0).r)
#define F_Len(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,1),0).g)
#define V_x(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,1),0).b)
#define V_y(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,1),0).a)
#define PSI(tex,idx) (texelFetch(tex, idx*2+ivec2(1,1),0).a)
#define Wall(tex, idx) (any(greaterThan(texelFetch(tex, idx*2,0).rg, vec2(0.5)))?1.:0.)

bool is_wall(in sampler2D ch,in ivec2 idx, in ivec2 size){
    return (size.x < idx.x + 1) || (size.y < idx.y + 1) || (idx.x < 0) || (idx.y < 0) || (Wall(ch, idx) > 0.1);
}

vec4 save_color(in ivec2 off,in vec4[4] colors)
{
    return colors[/*3&*/(off.y<<1|off.x)];
}

const float G_self = 1.0;         // affect the surface tension of the liquid molecules
const float G_wall = 0.5;         // affect the surface tension between the liquid and the wall
const vec2  g = vec2(0, -.008);   // gravity
const float k = 1.2;//.5;         // affect the viscidity, range: 0.1~1.9
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
Buffer B
Buffer C
